panels.description: Shows the last block number detected. It should always have a positive trend.
panels.title: Last detected block height

panels.description: Show the last successfully processed event height
panels.title: Last processed block height

panels.description: How many times the current pending event to be processed was retried. This number should be in general zero. Maybe up to 3. If this number is high, something is wrong sine we're stuck at trying to process the event for some reason that should be fixed.
panels.title: Retry execution rounds

panels.description: The latency of 95% tile. Note that CreateTable is a long running request since requires sending a txn to Ethereum. The rest should have low-ish latencies.
panels.title: Methods 95-tile latency

panels.description: Raw 95th tile latency of all executed queries in the database.
panels.title: Overall SQL query 95-th latency

panels.description: The latency of 95% tile. Note that CreateTable is a long running request since requires sending a txn to Ethereum. The rest should have low-ish latencies.
panels.title: REST 95-tile latency

panels.description: The latency of 95% tile. Note that CreateTable is a long running request since requires sending a txn to Ethereum. The rest should have low-ish latencies.
panels.title: JSON RPC 95-tile latency
